content:
In the CI build, https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/US-Core-R4/CapabilityStatement-us-core-server.html#medication

A Server SHALL be capable of supporting the following _revincludes:
Provenance:target - GET [base]/Medication?[parameter=value]&_revinclude=Provenance:target

There is no required search parameter for Medication resource, so what is the [parameter=value] combination?
